scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Hannah Huyck
scrape.text: Unfortunately, I couldn't get further than the first 100 pages. I found the characters to be unlikable, especially the main character and it didn't feel like it was getting anywhere. I also feel that most of what I read wasn't necessary to further the story. The synopsis sounded interesting, but I feel that the book had the same issues as Gone Girl and thus wasnt successful in my opinion. I definitely wouldn't recommend this book to anyone.
